name: Kollide-a-Scope
description:
'Kollide-A-Scope' is an arcade-inspired pixel art Dodge-em's game. You play as a fly trapped inside a Kaleidoscope,  and must help maneuver him to freedom over the course of 10 levels, each getting progressively harder.  

Dodge falling gems and don't get hit, or else its back to level  1!

A small note,

This game contains bright flashing colours and many moving parts !

Release Date: 23/06/22
